column5: Heading to the Kawarthas Monday and was wondering if anyone knows the current gas prices around Peterborough?
Seems to be in the 101-104 range.
you can check www.ontariogasprices.com   its a user updated site so it may not be exactly current...but it'll give you an idea.
Thanks Dutch..  I've got to fill the boat/truck (170 litres) and just wanted to know the difference in price from here in town(104 also). Thanks again....
Get a CT Options Mastercard.  That many litres will net you a ton of CT money....
Just got back tonight - gas on the north-west side was 99.9. We got it on the way out of Fowlers Corners on the #7/ 28. Hope that helps   Don

In Barrie it was 93 all weekend,and can you believe a gas station ran out of gas at that price. Can you say SAVINGS. LOL  Hope it like that come this weekend when it,s time to fill the boat and truck again.
Get ready for an increase soon.  Hamilton went up 4 cents on the weekend to $1.04
Hey guys why not come north to get your gas, our prices went down the other day by 4 cents we now only pay $1.23 per litre in Red Lake.
That makes us feel so much better.LOL OUCH
